document_data.mainbody:
ilbarr Whistlepocket was an investigative reporter who worked for Baldurs Mouth in Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Zilbarr was a bearded and bespectacled rosy-cheeked inquisitive gnome.
On Kythorn 24 of the , Zilbarr Whistlepocket found himself in the Blushing Mermaid tavern in the Lower City, where he came across a fellow investigator named Tav, whod spent the previous several days untangling the grisly murder on Sailors Crossing. Zilbarr recognized Tav as a fellow investigator and shared his own findings on the case apparently a series of murders, the third in a row in three tendays. Zilbarr shared that the other murders took place in Insight Park and the Silver Crescent Beach. Tav promised to inform Zilbarr of any future findings and set off to investigate the murder sites.
On Kythorn 29, Tav read the latest article from under Zilbarr Whistlepockets quill a report on yet another murder, this time at the Blade and Stars. Soon after, Tav visited Zilbarr at his desk on the second floor of Baldurs Mouth offices. The investigators exchanged notes, and Zilbarr sent Tav to interview the mortician who dealt with the bodies at the Harborside Hospital. Another lead of Zilbarrs was the druid of Insight Park. However, Tavs and Zilbarrs investigation was never completed as several days later, Tav was murdered by the mysterious white-scaled dragonborn known as the Dark Urge of Bhaal.
